meaningMnemonic:
<kanji>Above</kanji> <kanji>mention</kanji>s are <vocabulary>above mentioned</vocabulary>. Look above to see where I mentioned it, okay?

Note that 上述 is a word commonly used in formal writing such as reports, academic papers, or business documents.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
